Quests: Set some goals for 2024, either personal or professional
Clean up your workspace (physical or digital) and send a picture/screenshot to your Claan chat!
Block out at least 30 minutes per day to have lunch away from your desk
Grab a drink or a coffee with a member of a different Claan and have a chat
Organise or attend a catch-up with your Claan and make a Claan slogan
